column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We also ordered their shrimp balls as appetizers which were good but nothing amazing
column2: in my opinion. The dessert was mediocre too
column3: we tried out the chocolate mochi
column4: green tea pistachio popsicle and the pana Cotta. Compared to the ramen
column5: these didn't blow my mind. Will be back here when I'm feeling fancier than my dollar ramen packets!
